## Installation of CCTV System at Douglas – Peace Arch Border Crossing

### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number:** 1000417113
* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-25
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-22T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-15
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

### Contract Description

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking proposals for the installation of a Closed Circuit Television (CCTV) system at the Douglas – Peace Arch border crossing. This project aims to enhance the security and surveillance capabilities of the border crossing.

### Trade Agreements

This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other international free trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Solicitation Documents

Solicitation documents, including a Notice of Proposed Procurement and a Request for Proposal (RFP), can be found on the CanadaBuys website. Bidders must review these documents carefully and submit their proposals in accordance with the specified requirements.

### Site Visit

A mandatory site visit will take place on October 4, 2023. Bidders must confirm their attendance with the Contracting Authority before October 2, 2023. The site visit will commence at 10:00 AM.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* **Veronique Fulham**, Contact Person
* **Phone:** (111) 111-1111
* **Email:** veronique.fulham@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
* **Address:** 355 North River Road, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0L8

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Lowest Price

### Debriefing

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days from receipt of the results. The debriefing may be conducted in writing, by telephone, or in person. 

[Attachment]

You can download the solicitation documents in English from the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20515/1000417113b--rfp.pdf

Or in French from: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender
